name: TTV live
description: TTV live extension helps you keep track of who is live out of the channels you follow on twitch.tv
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://api.twitch.tv https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net; script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; style-src 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' https://static-cdn.jtvnw.net data:;
